answerText: coordination compounds[10] In a coordination compound, this name is given to the molecules or anions that bond to complex ions.
heading: ICCS |2014 | 5 | 20 | Science | Chemistry | College
subject: Science
question: Question: One class of these compounds is called chelates, and some of these containing EDTA are used to treat heavy-metal poisoning.  [10] Name these chemical species that contain at least one complex ion consisting of a central metal cation bonded to other molecules or anions.
